tune.name: The Pianist in Black and White
tune.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
tune.content:
\relative f <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key e \minor
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 b4 |
      e8 fis g e b'4 a8 b |
      a8 g fis e fis d d' d, |
      fis8 d d' fis, e fis g e |
      b'4 a8 g fis a g fis |
      \break

      e8 fis g e b'4 a8 b |
      a8 g fis e fis d d' d, |
      fis8 d d' fis, e8 fis g e |
      b'8 a g fis e d e fis |
      \bar "||" \break

      g8 d b d g4 fis8 g |
      fis8 a g fis e c c' c, |
      e8 c c' c, d b g' b, |
      dis8 b a' dis, e d e fis |
      \break

      g8 d b d g4 fis8 g |
      fis8 a g fis e c c' c, |
      e8 c c' c, d b g' b, |
      dis8 b a' dis, e4
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      e1:m | d | b2:m e:m | e:m b:7 |
      e1:m | d | b2:m e:m | b:7 e4:m d:7 |

      g1 | b2:m c | c g | b:7 e4:m d:7 |
      g1 | b2:m c | c g | b:7 e4:m
    }
  }
>>
